Converts time from one timezone to the next Inspired by \href{http://truelogic.org/wordpress/2011/05/22/php-function-to-convert-time-from-one-timezone-to-another/}{\tt http\-://truelogic.\-org/wordpress/2011/05/22/php-\/function-\/to-\/convert-\/time-\/from-\/one-\/timezone-\/to-\/another/} U\-S\-A\-G\-E\-: Gets a G\-M\-T date and turns it into a U\-S East Coast Time \$timezone = new g\-Timezone(); \$us\-East\-Coast = \$timezone-\/$>$(0, “2011-\/05-\/09 11\-:00\-:00″, -\/5);


\begin{DoxyParams}[1]{Parameters}
int & {\em \$conv\-\_\-fr\-\_\-zon} & the 'from' timezone for the date to be converted, representing deviation from G\-M\-T (such as -\/5 for U\-S Eastern Time) \\
\hline
string & {\em \$conv\-\_\-fr\-\_\-time} & the time to be converted \\
\hline
int & {\em \$conv\-\_\-to\-\_\-zon} & the 'to' timezone for the new date, representing deviation from G\-M\-T (such as -\/5 for U\-S Eastern Time)\\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}

\end{DoxyReturn}
